text: vah vahee khuda hai jisane rooe zameen mein tum logon ko (agalon ka) jaanasheen banaaya phir jo shakhs kaafir hoga to usake kufr ka vabaal usee par padega aur kaafiron ko unaka kuphr unake paravaradigaar kee baaragaah mein gazab ke siva kuchh badhaega nahin aur kuphfaar ko unaka kufr ghaate ke siva kuchh nafa na dega
